Reference

All functions

LearnerClassifKNNGower

Learner: classif.knngower

LearnerRegrKNNGower

Learner: regr.knngower

MeasureMBSPCAMEV

MB-SPCA Mean Explained Variance

MeasureMBsPLS_BlockEV

MB-sPLS mean block-wise explained variance (test)

MeasureMBsPLS_EV

MB-sPLS mean explained variance across components (test)

MeasureMBsPLS_EVWeightedMAC

MB-sPLS EV-weighted latent correlation (test)

MeasureMBsPLS_MAC

MB-sPLS mean latent correlation across components (test)

PipeOpBlockScaling

PipeOpBlockScaling

PipeOpFeatureSuffix

Append a suffix to all task feature names

PipeOpMBsPCA

Multi-Block Sparse PCA (MB-sPCA) Transformer

PipeOpMBsPLSBootstrapSelect

Post-hoc bootstrap feature selection

PipeOpSiteCorrection

Site-/Batch-Effect Correction PipeOp (block-specific, lean)

TunerSeqMBsPCA

Sequential Component-wise Tuner for Group-Sparse MB-sPCA

TunerSeqMBsPLS

Sequential Component-wise Tuner for MB-sPLS

aggregate_mbspls_payloads()

Aggregate MB-sPLS test metrics across outer CV folds

autoplot(<GraphLearner>)

Autoplot for GraphLearner with MB-sPLS (branch-aware, source-consistent)

collect_mbspls_nested_cv()

Collect and summarize results from MB-sPLS nested CV Batchtools jobs

impute_knn_graph()

Create a k-NN Imputation Graph

mbspls_eval_new_data()

Evaluate MB-sPLS on New Data (EV per block/component, MAC, scores, weights)

mbspls_extract_bootstrap_means()

Extract mean bootstrap weights with CI/frequency filtering

mbspls_flip_weights()

Flip signs of MB-sPLS weights/loadings/scores

mbspls_graph()

MB-sPLS Graph: preproc -> MB-sPLS -> bootstrap-select (two selection methods)

mbspls_graph_learner()

MB-sPLS GraphLearner: preproc -> MB-sPLS -> bootstrap-select (two selection methods) -> learner

mbspls_measures

Measures for MB-sPLS (test-time)

mbspls_nested_cv()

Nested CV for unsupervised MB-sPLS

mbspls_nested_cv_batchtools()

Perform nested cross-validation for MB-sPLS using batchtools

mbspls_plot_block_weight_ci()

Plot LC block weights with 95% CIs from a GraphLearner (or legacy inputs)

mbspls_preproc_graph()

Default MB-sPLS Preprocessing Graph

mlr3mbspls-package mlr3mbspls

mlr3mbspls: Multi-Block Sparse PLS for mlr3
